title: Border Fringe, early 17th century
dimensions:
19.2 x 48 cm (7 9/16 x 18 7/8 in.)
Repeat: 5 and 1/2 inches
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border with highly stylized male and female figures, with pendant triangles below, finished with a long fringe.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border Fringe, early 17th century.
early 17th century. Medium: linen
Technique: knotting (macramé). Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-280.
